attributes.action: Reject the culture that rewards failure and act appropriatly to stamp this out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that it is wrong and immoral to reward failure as a politician or public servant. Rewards such as appointment to the House Of Lords devalue the higher chamber and send the message that public servants and politicians are not accountable and have a right to call on the public purse for thier persoanl gain. This devalues the people in public life and the processes they establish and administer.Reward for failure or dishonesty removes the moral right of politicans to lead given to them in trust by the electorate

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
